mapper.select: SELECT GIFTICON_CODE, BRAND_CODE, MENU_CODE, GIFTICON_NAME, GIFTICON_IMG, GIFTICON_PRICE, GIFTICON_DATE FROM GIFTICON WHERE GIFTICON_CODE = #{gifticonCode}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GIFTICON ( GIFTICON_CODE, BRAND_CODE, MENU_CODE, GIFTICON_NAME, GIFTICON_IMG, GIFTICON_PRICE, GIFTICON_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(GIFTICON_CODE)),0)+1 FROM GIFTICON), #{brandCode}, #{menuCode}, #{gifticonName}, #{gifticonImg}, #{gifticonPrice}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE GIFTICON SET GIFTICON_NAME = #{gifticonName}, GIFTICON_PRICE = #{gifticonPrice}, GIFTICON_IMG = #{gifticonImg} WHERE GIFTICON_CODE = #{gifticonCode} AND BRAND_CODE = #{brandCode} AND MENU_CODE = #{menuCode}
